title: Grand East Sussex Mansion Luxury in Ashdown Forest with Country Club
description: Experience the grandeur of East Sussex with a stay at Ashdown Park Hotel and Country Club, a majestic manor house nestled in the heart of the Ashdown Forest. This quintessentially English retreat boasts an award-winning spa, an 18-hole golf course and a two AA Rosette restaurant, Anderida. Wander through the hotel's 186 acres of manicured gardens, explore the enchanting forest or visit the nearby Royal Tunbridge Wells for a spot of boutique shopping.
location_description: Ashdown Park Hotel and Country Club
offer_address: Wych Cross, Forest Row, East Sussex, RH18 5JR, United Kingdom
